name: Prototype of a space game
description:
So this is a very basic prototype of a game where you will have your ship, land on planets and do stuff. I am thinking most of the player activity will be resource gathering (for fuel, food and energy), but at this point all the doors are open: who knows what cool stuff we will be able to do one day?

Nonetheless, in this prototype you can:
- Accelerate and rotate your ship with arrow keys
- Lose fuel
- Cause minimal damage to your ship
- Use a tractor beam to capture people
- "Land"
- Deploy your pilot on the ground and walk

Looking forward to feedback and ideas!
